channel.title: Need someone to edit this
channel.description:
Yo
Just finishing my designs for new graphic decals. Just wondering if anyone here can fix these up a bit? Maybe make them a little bit more professional? The side plates have a gradual changing colors, I need that changed to the blue of the front plate (colors can't be like that). Just maybe make it mould with the airbox decal with the logos, etc?
The rear fender decals need to be made more professional too. I've attached the eps kit, and an example of an example of something I'm after.

item.title: Need someone to edit this
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:
